Articles.Content:
Good day

I bought KSP before 1 week ago.I play this game before 2 year.I just have a big problem. When i Lunch rocket the rocket start shacking a lote.I don't want its reason. If rocket in Space without atmosphere start again shacking. It is no normal for me. When i play the game before 2 year its no the have this problem.I just want to ask help.I install mods .

Next question i want to asking.Before 2 year when i play the game have 1 mod rocket fuel don't empty so quickly .
You can disable the camera shake in the settings, accessed from the main menu.

On 12/3/2022 at 7:21 AM, noguild said:

Good day

I bought KSP before 1 week ago.I play this game before 2 year.I just have a big problem. When i Lunch rocket the rocket start shacking a lote.I don't want its reason. If rocket in Space without atmosphere start again shacking. It is no normal for me. When i play the game before 2 year its no the have this problem.I just want to ask help.I install mods .

Next question i want to asking.Before 2 year when i play the game have 1 mod rocket fuel don't empty so quickly .

Wait, is it the camera view that's shaking or the rocket itself? If it's just the camera view, and no explosions, then just follow @jimmymcgoochie's advice. If it's the rocket that shakes and explodes, seems you have a severe case of the kraken.
